body:
Visit a sustainable farm and vineyard which includes an organic blueberry farm. Meet the proprietor and walk with her on some of her 100 acres of ocean view hills above Lompoc. After the tour enjoy sipping the award-winning french inspired wine she has grown on the property. Lunch included. This tour is $110 per person beginning at 11am and ending at 2pm.  If you choose to add a second private vineyard tour and tasting the cost is $160 per person and begins at 11am and ends at 4pm.

Please call to book this tour.
title: Deluxe Private Vineyard Visit

email.gratuity: Please bring cash to tip your guide.
